title: We were in a rush to get these items…
text: We were in a rush to get these items for a trade show, we called the customer service line as the online estimate showed the items would not arrive until after the show. After speaking with the CS rep we followed through with the order and received our items ahead of schedule! Quality of the embroidery is top notch!

title: Customer Service Rep
text: It would be great if you assigned a customer service rep to my account Penny is the rep a prefer outstanding service helps in what ever way she can.Spoke to here 10/11,10/16,10/23 and in the future.Since she is familiar with my account, she always has great suggestions and follows up. She is an asset to Queensboro company.

title: Great quality and service
text: I just received a couple of beanies and a polo shirt and the quality is great. I'll definitely be adding Queensboro to the list of companies I order merch from. I also had to talk to them about the design and the service was much better than expected.

title: Customer service is out of this world!
text: Customer service is out of this world!! The first order just wasn't as I expected it to be, so I couldn't mark it "perfect" and just like that they offered to make the small changes to make it "perfect"! The quality is excellent and customer service is even better. Give them a try and don't be afraid- YOU are their first priority!!

title: The process for your No Returns…
text: The process for your No Returns Necessary Program was easy and your customer service representative was unusually helpful for these days.  I felt like I was experiencing customer service from decades ago.The shirt you made for me was so nice that other team parents are asking about it, I'll be sending them to your website so they can buy their own!

title: Long term cistomer
text: We have been using Queensboro for probably 20 years.  The quality and service is outstanding.  Just once we had an issue over all those years and Queensboro took care of the situation to 100% of our satisfaction.

title: The Sweater and Logo Are Perfect
text: The first sweater I received did not have a good color combination. But you fixed it! This second one is perfect. Processing and shipping were all quick. I plan to use this logo on shirts as well.

title: New Customer
text: When I say Mia.W the CSR or SR was very helpful and knowledgeable of the products and prices not one time was she aggressive as for as pushing a item but she made some great suggestions thanks Mia.W we all need people like you on our team

title: Adjusted or logo colors to stand out against the background.
text: Great selection, ease of ordering, and we know it will look great. We have a logo on file, and when we ordered dark hats you flipped the logo colors so they would be visible against the background - it turned out great!

title: Quality
text: High quality, fair price, custom embroidered hat. Fast shipping, and even accepted an order quantity of one.

title: I’ve been using Queensboro  for some…
text: I’ve been using Queensboro  for some time, and they are fantastic. The product quality is great and the support is outstanding, which is equally important.I recommend queensboro.Best regards,

title: Late but good
text: Missed original production date promised but all was good with the order. Shirts and jacket were nice.

title: Great company, service & products!
text: I loved the opportunity to do a one-off product as a sample! The quality, communication process and everything else was excellent!

title: They do what it takes
text: I love getting the email specials - Although we don't buy as much as I'd like - when the right deal comes through, Queensboro always makes a great product for us.

title: We have been using Queensboro for many…
text: We have been using Queensboro for many years and always have received fast, quality service!

title: Worth the delays
text: Required rework on both of my previous projects, but customer service is OUTSTANDING and fixed the problems at no extra expense to me. I am very happy with the quality of the products and will purchase from them again.

title: Fixed the problem without question
text: The original order was messed up in production, logos were all in the wrong places. One quick phone call and the agent verified where things were supposed to be vs where they were and reordered without question. I’ve used Queensboro for several years in a couple of different businesses and this was the first problem I experienced and it was rectified immediately without question. Since I did not have to return the original shipment I donated them.

title: The best decision is be made
text: This was my first time ordering on line and I made st tell you I was very very nervous. Nervous that I was going to be throwing money out the window. Well, Queensboro really made me feel as I was making the right choice but,that I was in good hands. Queensboro went above and beyond. The polo shirt did not feel cheap. The stitching didn’t look rushed. It was perfect! If it’s your first time buying a couple of shirts… don’t hesitate..they will help you and they will make sure you are satisfied. I’m definitely going to be a life time costumer. Thank you Queensboro ❤️

title: We’ve always had a great experience…
text: We’ve always had a great experience with Queensboro. Fair prices, excellent quality and great service!

title: Absolutely spectacular customer service!
text: I ordered two shirts in XL and should have ordered XXL.Queensboro sent two replacements within a week.Absolutely spectacular customer service!

title: process was seamless
text: The process was seamless. I had one question and I was responded to immediately. The shirts are of exceptional quality and the logo that I uploaded was perfectly placed on the shirts and  the colors matched perfectly. Delivery was as promised also.

title: Smooth
text: Overall — very easy process. I’ve worked with other companies in the past and this was one of the easiest. I will definitely be ordering more for y’all in the future.

title: It was easy to order
text: It was easy to order, match up thread colors for the different colors of items. User friendly site, great deal, love the final product!

title: AMAZING AMAZING AMAZING!!!!!
text: Excellent customer service.  Communication throughout the process.  The fact that you were able to change the way you shipped the product at the last minute to ensure I received it, amazing! Also, the pricing was better than everyone else’s out there.  The ability to buy the size color and type and not have some idiotic minimum or some minimum price I have to pay OUTSTANDING!!!  Way to go, I will be ordering more and you have earned my business.

title: Easy Peasy
text: The order was easy to place and delivered swiftly. Communication on the tracking and delivery was very good.

title: I was really appreciative of how you…
text: I was really appreciative of how you handled my order and fixed it for me.. Thanks again as I’m I’m sure I will be ordering more in the near future

title: The Reason I Keep Coming Back
text: The Reason I Keep Coming Back. I have ordered from Queensboro for years now, thousands of dollars of merchandise and I will continue to come back because the quality has literally NEVER been anything short of perfect. I haven't even had to contact them to fix anything.

title: Bull Logo
text: Queenbro  has good products and the embroidery  is amazing  I love the notification about specials  and the customer  service  is the best . Queenbro is our govto for polo's sweatshirts beanies and ball caps .

title: Great experience
text: First time ordering from them and I will again. The jacket was snug and they immediately made another and shipped it to me. Great customer service!

title: Always a great experience with the…
text: Always a great experience with the queen. Product is always on point no complaints ever always better then expecting!!

title: Highly Recommend!!!
text: Polos came out better than I could have thought. They were a super good price and they look really good and are super comfortable. The company was extremely good at keeping me updated on the status of my order. Definitely plan on ordering from here again.

title: We have used Queensboro for many years…
text: We have used Queensboro for many years and have always been pleased. Never had any problems with quality and always get it quicker than expected. Customer service is excellent! If there's a better company out there, I'm just fine with Queensboro.THANK YOUDP Heating & Air

title: I love these guys
text: I love these guys! Queensboro has been my go to for the past 15 years! They have been with me through the dream, implementation, success and now legacy of growing my company over the years. They deliver high quality consistence at reasonable pricing. I recommend them without hesitation.David Leavitt, CEOAmerican Forensics Dallas, Texas

title: Customer service is exceptional in the…
text: Customer service is exceptional in the last 20 years. The owner has done a fantastic job running such a competitive product hats off to your Queensborough. You do the job right a true American company. Stay blessed and successful.Erik Hagstrom

title: Great customer service
text: I’m very happy with my experience with Queensboro. I’ll be ordering more soon.

title: Queensboro is fantastic!!
text: Queensboro is fantastic!!! Their custom apparel is top notch in quality. I always shop from them as they are very reliable.

title: Just ordered a polo
text: Just ordered a poloShirt and sweatshirt, came out outstanding exactly what I wanted, lettering was actually better and bigger then expected, the texts I get randomly for deals are exceptional. I highly recommend this company in all embroidery and would expect great quality in prints as well if they didn’t have a minimum count on them.

title: Custom polo
text: Easy ordering and great pricing and completed quickly. Thanks for making small run orders for small business.

title: Perfection as always
text: Arrived in a timely fashion and the quality, fit and logo were as requested.

title: I love my shirts
text: The shirts I ordered at first were a little big, but Queensboro immediately put in a replacement order for me. When I got them, they were absolutely perfect. I will only ever order through Queensboro.

title: Awesome products and even more awesome personnel
text: The quality of the products and the speed with which they arrive are all amazing, but they're secondary to the exemplary service we get from Megan Pecararo. We're currently switching all of our uniform needs to Queensboro due to how amazing she has been to work with.

title: Rain jackets brought me tears of joy!
text: I made my order a few weeks ago for some rain jackets for the upcoming wet season. When they arrived I had a huge smile on my face as they looked exactly as desired and now my team can look professional in our new gear!

title: Customer Service Second to None
text: Queensboro’s customer service is second to none! Their No Return Necessary policy and no-hassle easy replacement when a shirt arrived with a small stain from the factory, made my most recent purchase of logoed apparel easy and carefree. Queensboro has earned my loyalty time and again.

title: You guys are great

text: Great quality and they have certainly sped up their process in getting your stuff done. Plus I love the fact we don’t have to order a minimum of four items now.

title: One of the cleanest designs yet on a…

text: Smooth ordering process and order arrived during the stated time frame. Logo looks good on the shirts.

title: The communication is excellent!
text: The communication is excellent!Very helpful, in helping me order.And the items came out great! Also love all the deals they constantly offer!!! It’s getting cold, and my husband is ready to order some hoodies and jackets! Great company! We’ll be using them and sharing them with other companies we know!

title: My order was exactly what I had expected
text: Date of experience: September 25, 2024

title: I am very happy with my order from…
text: I am very happy with my order from Queensboro. The shirts and hats turned out far better than expected. Moreover, its prices are far more reasonable than the competition.  I will definitely be submitting another order soon.

title: Great working with Anthony on the Grande Dunes Bocce Club Order
text: I have been working with Anthony on this order for the Grande Dunes Bocce Club in Myrtle Beach, SC. He has promptly answered all of my questions.We aim to present the following items to the membership: polo shirts, twill hats, visors, beanies, and fleece jackets.Our first task was to find the perfect logo. The original design did not work out because the design was too intricate, making the circular logo too small. The remedy was to use a text logo that is easy to read. After a couple of iterations, the shirt and hat colors were selected as green and red. The white embroidery clearly defines the Grande Dunes Bocce Club.We look forward to working with Anthony and submitting more orders soon.Joe

title: They always insure the product meets my…
text: They always insure the product meets my expectations.

title: Great Product and Great Customer Service
text: We have placed a number of orders for my staff. Communication and customer service are excellent. Very responsive and professional. We are treated as a valued customer. Products are always reasonably priced and they stand behind them 100% always ready to correct any problem with no exceptions. We will continue to purchase from Queensboro and look forward to a long standing relationship. Thanks and keep up the great work!!

title: Spent a little extra money to get Bella…
text: Spent a little extra money to get Bella Canvas and Next Level shirts. The feel and fit of them is much smoother and fits well with my style.This was a test order for DTF printing. I tried a color design and a black and white design and a new, one color logo.All my designs came out sharp and clear and true to my vision.Like a shirt I received at the Haiku North America conference in Cincinnati last year, at first the full front and full back designs feel a little heavy and stiff.That shirt softened up nicely after a few washes, and I’m sure these will as well.Placing this order was convenient. I did it one session and didn’t need any assistance from Queensboro staff.So, for my needs, yes, the order was perfect.

title: The product was perfect
text: The product was perfect. They brought my bakery logo to life, and did it well before the deadline they have themselves!

title: The customer service is great as always.

title: Great product very clean Highly recommend

title: Your customer service is stellar
text: Your customer service is stellar. Just recommended my employer to you for a bunch of shirts, etc.

title: Great Service!
text: I try my best to provide great service to all my patients. It is nice to see an organization like Queensboro who tries its best to provide the same service that I try to instill in my business everyday! No redundant questions asked and needless info needed. Did it work or not? Does it fit? Are you happy with your purchase? The answer is YES every time! I love the fact that they follow up as it should be. Great job!

title: Great work for great price
text: Great work for great price. Thank you

text: Called for a bigger size shirt. The new order was just perfect. Thank you.

title: Great products and great customer…
text: Great products and great customer service. They go above and beyond to make sure everything is perfect!

title: Super happy with my experience
text: Super happy with my experience. I had forwarded a picture for our logo that I couldn’t alter, but the Queensboro team quickly leveraged their photoshop skills and allowed me to change the thread colors of certain aspects of the logo based on the color of shirt/hat it was being embroidered on. The hats and shirts turned out AMAZING. Thanks folks. As we grow, we will be coming back for more. .

title: Great service.
text: Great service.

title: Love their products and service
text: I have been using Queensboro for the last year and a half and I love their products, customer service, and the prices when they have specials.

title: Great products superior customer service
text: Date of experience: September 24, 2024

title: No need to go broke to look professional
text: Great quality and selection. I'm not a big organization with a huge budget for apparel and Queensboro put professional branded attire within my reach and helped immediately boost my confidence in being in business for myself as opposed to putting myself in massive debt with huge order minimums that I would have to dig out of before feeling good about my purchase.  I have ordered product from Queensboro for a few years and only once had a mistake that was more so an error of understanding on my part and they stepped up and made it right with no hassle.

title: Love these guys
text: Love these guys, great prices and top quality

title: Great customer service from Adaire
text: Adaire is the perfect manager of our account. Always goes above and beyond!

title: Great place

title: Easy, amazing selections, and great service.
text: It was so easy to order custom items with the logo already saved in your database.  And the selection of shirts and other items is just amazing.  I was also happy with the time it took to make the custom items and ship them to me.  One more thing I thought was great--your communication.  I always knew where we were in the process.  Thanks so much.

title: Was very streamlined
text: Was very streamlined, customer service reached out to me to ask if I needed any help without me even asking. The products I received were well worth the price that I paid and I did not have to wait long at all. I would highly recommend Queensboro to anyone who needs embroidery or similar work done at a great price.

text: I order shirts for my french horn ensemble members every year from Queensboro. The customer service is excellent and I am able to get high quality shirts for a very reasonable price for my students.
